backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining app metadata, access control, user profiles, vendors, products, and authorization‑gated admin/user methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing affected frontend files, components, and test IDs for the updated admin permission flow.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of major frontend components, hooks, pages, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining color tokens, theming variables, and global styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining public, admin, and vendor routes with authentication and role guards.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthControl: Auth control component handling Internet Identity login/logout and displaying the current principal.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Route guard checking admin or app‑owner authorization and showing loading, error, or denial states.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Authentication guard requiring Internet Identity login before accessing protected routes.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Role‑mode guard redirecting authenticated users to select-role when no role is chosen.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main app layout with header, content area, and footer including a dynamic year and referral link.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Renders the top navigation bar with links, role-based admin access, and authentication controls.
frontend/src/components/status/Connectio: Displays backend connectivity, version info, and authentication status with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/vendor/VendorPro: Form for creating or updating products, handling validation, backend submission, and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, including login, logout, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarketplaceQueries: Contains React Query hooks to fetch and mutate marketplace data like products, vendors, and profiles via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks calling backend actor methods to fetch backend status, ping status, and caller identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoleMode.ts: Manages admin or vendor role mode in localStorage with helpers for setting and clearing roles.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining light/dark theme variables and global UI tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
Admin dashboard placeholder implementing admin checks, vendor verification, admin management, and owner controls.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page outlining marketplace features and navigation to products and role selection.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays full product details, including price, image, vendor info, and handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/PublicProductsPage.ts: Public product list with search, category filtering, navigation to detail pages, and loading/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/RoleSelectPage.tsx: UI for choosing admin or vendor role, checking authorization and navigating accordingly.
frontend/src/pages/VendorLayoutPage.tsx: Vendor dashboard layout with tabs for profile and products, rendering child routes.
frontend/src/pages/VendorPlaceholderPage: Empty placeholder page with no content.
frontend/src/pages/VendorProductsPage.ts: Displays vendor products with loading/error states and dialogs for creating or editing products.
frontend/src/pages/VendorProfilePage.tsx: Vendor profile form allowing creation or updating of company info with loading and mutation states.
Lists verified vendors with loading, error, and empty states, allowing navigation to individual storefronts.
Public vendor storefront showing vendor info and products, with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/types/marketplace.ts: Empty type file with no content.
frontend/src/utils/placeholders.ts: Exports static paths for product and vendor logo placeholder images.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), store/retrieve them in sessionStorage, and persist or clear them as needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, features, and pending authorization-related requests for admin permission flows and backend support.
